  • Called when a vote is closed

DEPRECATED same as vote function - Used when a reaction is removed

votebot.help(self, channel_id, team_id)[source]¶

Help message function

votebot.run(self, message)[source]¶

This function is called everytime a data is received trougth the connexion.

The vote process have four states:

  • zero

    • This state is the initial state of the bot. it wait the instruction of user.

      User can start the vote or get help command.

      When create commande is insert, state switch to ‘createVote’

  • createVote

    • In this state, the bot ask user to give the subject and the emojis for the vote.

      When user have define his vote, the state goes to setReactions

  • setReactions

    • The reaction are add to the slack message (in the chat...) so users can easily click to vote

      go to state vote when all reactions have been added

  • vote

    • It wait the user to close the vote or ask for help command

      When user close the vote, the state go to ‘zero’

votebot.sendText(self, message, channel_id, team_id)[source]¶

This function send text in the chat

votebot.setVoteRep(self, possibleRep, user_name, team_id)[source]¶

Set the possible responses of the vote

  • the votes possibilities are split by the ‘=’.
  • emoji and definition are saved
votebot.setVoteSubject(self, subject, user_name, team_id)[source]¶

Set the question of the vote

votebot.vote(self, voted_emoji)[source]¶

Store a vote

DEPRECATED

  • the votes aren’t saved anymore. the number of reaction define the result of the vote
